sub_title: Global Change Management Lead at Accenture
summary: A highly organized and detail oriented individual, with past experience in legal operations, Finance and Sales. Flexible and analytical, with a proven track record of synthesizing and analyzing data to achieve overall objectives. Highly motivated and goal oriented professional, able to work and communicate effectively with people of all ages and background. An enthusiastic and confident person, skilled problem solver and multi-tasker, with strong leadership capabilities.

profile_positions.description:
- Design, develop and lead the implementation of change management strategies across the account coordinating with stakeholders from varying departments, internal and external
- Enable the design, development, delivery and management of key communication channels, internal and external
- Perform/assess change impact, analyze potential project impacts/risks and create risk mitigation plans
- Responsible for issue resolution and escalation management across projects
- Develop and maintain a strong working relationship with the client, assessing past performance and future strategical outlooks for the whole account
profile_positions.title: Global Change Management Lead (LERT- Trust & Safety, Global Social Media Company)

profile_positions.description:
- Set up a new team for CREW
- Established team goals, project structure, training and implementation timelines and client integration framework
- Handled performance management, short term planning and expansion plans
- Responsible for 5 team members in the CREW project spread across Austin, USA and Dublin, Ireland
profile_positions.title: Team Lead/Project Lead, Civil Regulatory Electoral Workflows (CREW)

profile_positions.description:
- Shifted to project headquarters in Dublin, Ireland to better manage increased portfolio under LERT
- Roles and responsibilities as a team lead in LERT carried over from the previous position in Accenture Singapore
- Leading a team of 13 with market responsibility across Europe, India, Asia – Pacific and USA
profile_positions.title: Team Lead  (LERT- Trust & Safety, Global Social Media Company)

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for a multicultural team of 15 people including Associates, QA leads and Subject Matter Experts (SMEs)
- Ensure high quality and timely delivery of results measured against service-level agreement (SLA) requirements and internal metrics
- Allocate resources based on present and future operation outlooks
- Embed new processes and workflows into the team to ensure agility in a dynamic legal landscape
- Working closely with cross-functional stakeholders and global leadership teams to implement new improved workflows. 
- Conduct 1:1's, career counseling, mentoring, performance development and conflict management huddles
- Interview, hire, onboard and develop employees
profile_positions.title: Team Lead (LERT, Trust & Safety, Global Social Media Company)

profile_positions.description:
-Ensured that the team of 10+ analysts adheres to client specified quality scores with the aid of quality analysis and efficient task distribution
-Used to have regular catch-ups with individual members of the team to provide feedback on their quality and discuss paths to further improvements
-Prepared and regularly updated training material and curriculum to keep up with market dynamics and trends
-Trained and onboarded new analysts
-Designated Subject Matter Expert for APAC Region
-Initiated and implemented improvements to process documentation on regular intervals
-Regularly coordinated with counterpart teams in Dublin, Ireland, and Austin, Texas, to ensure client SLAs (Service Level Agreements) are met
profile_positions.title: QA Lead/Subject Matter Expert (LERT, Trust & Safety, Global Social Media Company)

profile_positions.description:
-Reviewed legal requests and content from law enforcement officials
-Ensured that all requests are scrutinized and handled in strict accordance with applicable law, client terms and services, and law enforcement guidelines
-Validated and responded to urgent and sensitive enquiries within established guidelines and SLAs set by the client
profile_positions.title: Business Process Service Analyst (LERT, Trust & Safety, Global Social Media Company)

profile_positions.description:
-Created and maintained a large client database
-Identified clients’ needs and determined best possible strategies to meet their financial requirements
-Maintained long term relationships with clients through timely follow up and reviews
-Adhered to compliance requirements to provide sound financial advice to clients
profile_positions.title: Financial Services Consultant

profile_positions.description:
-Managed the implementation and execution of the student pricing campaign for 800+ students across Singapore
-Managed operations and ensured proper coordination between the clients and the delivery team.
-Developed successful strategies for Facebook & Google ad campaigns.
-Assisted the sales department in cold calling, securing appointments and pitching the products & services offered
profile_positions.title: Business Development Intern

profile_positions.description:
-Major areas of concern were to draft balance sheets, vouching, make trial balance. 
-Worked closely with 3 companies to analyze their financial statements.

profile_positions.title: Summer Intern
